text: Helena Cardoso de Menezes was a sprinter from Brazil. Menezes competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. She was born on 22 January 1927 and died on 13 December 2020.Helena de Menezes == References == Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sprinters Category:Long jumpers Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Salvador, Bahia
title: Helena de Menezes
